upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20. 
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Settings.
* Fixed a bug where manual operation (using the button on the ZEN16) in garage door mode now functions as described in the Advanced Settings Article.
* Resolved an issue where parameter values 1 and 2 for parameters 21, 22, and 23 were not functioning properly, causing NC mode to revert to NO mode.
* When parameters 21, 22, and 23 are set to NC mode, parameters 2, 3, and 4 can now be configured with any value from 0-11 (previously limited to 0-3)
